summary: This is an email chain from June 2020 among personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a meeting about the Epstein trusts. It indicates ongoing legal work related to Epstein's financial assets after his death.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Mentioned as a participant in a meeting about the Epstein trusts being scheduled by personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Meeting about Epstein trusts scheduled
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Thursday (July 2, 2020, implied) between Audrey and other U.S. Attorney's Office personnel to discuss the Epstein trusts.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: As of June 2020, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively scheduling meetings to discuss the Epstein trusts.
The meeting was to involve at least one person named Audrey and other office personnel.
The correspondence shows continued post-mortem legal and financial investigation into Epstein's affairs by federal prosecutors.
